title: When you unlock a new skin and you want to show it off

replies.body: ...and then you forget to change your skin to the new one when selecting your champion

> ...and then you forget to change your skin to the new one when selecting your champion

Good god don't remind me...

But then the opponent got that skin as well.

And then we have U.R.F where all wear your skin you are using, except one (who becomes the unique one)

nope, thats the feeling
this gif explains the whole feeling
You missed the part where you immediately go 0/12, but it's still a moral victory because you got to show off the skin.

Alternatively, the first game you play with skin, and you penta like a boss.

This actually happened to me with Championship Shyvana.
More like the feeling you get when you get a mystery skin for a champ you dont like but you are going to use it anyways
